content:
Introduction This is bold text, and this is emphasized text.
#Generated by Clash Verge mode: rule profile: store-selected: true # 储存 API 对策略组的选择,以供下次启动时使用 store-fake-ip: true # 储存fakeip映射表,域名再次发生连接时，使用原有映射地址 mixed-port: 7890 allow-lan: false global-client-fingerprint: chrome find-process-mode: strict log-level: info geodata-mode: true unified-delay: true tcp-concurrent: true secret: '' external-controller: 127.0.0.1:9090 dns: enable: true prefer-h3: true listen: 0.0.0.0:1053 ipv6: true default-nameserver: - tls://223.5.5.5 - tls://1.1.1.1 enhanced-mode: fake-ip fake-ip-range: 198.18.0.1/16 fake-ip-filter: - '*.lan' - localhost.ptlogin2.qq.com nameserver: - https://223.5.5.5/dns-query fallback: - https://1.1.1.1/dns-query proxy-server-nameserver: - https://223.5.5.5/dns-query fallback-filter: geoip: true geoip-code: CN ipcidr: - 240.0.0.0/4 domain: - '+.google.com' - '+.facebook.com' - '+.github.com' - '+.youtube.com' tun: enable: true stack: gvisor dns-hijack: - any:53 auto-route: true auto-detect-interface: true auto-redit: true strict_route: true proxies: - name: "PROXY" type: hysteria server: port: auth_str: alpn: - h3 protocol: udp up: 11 down: 55 sni: skip-cert-verify: false recv_window_conn: 5767168 recv_window: 23068672 disable_mtu_discovery: false fast-open: true sniffer: #【Meta专属】sniffer域名嗅探器 enable: true # 嗅探器开关 # 开启后对 redir-host 类型识别的流量进行强制嗅探 # 包含 Tun、Redir 和 TProxy 或 DNS 为 redir-host # force-dns-mapping: false # parse-pure-ip: false # 对所有未获取到域名的流量进行强制嗅探 override-destination: false # 是否使用嗅探结果作为实际访问，默认 true # 全局配置，优先级低于 sniffer.sniff 实际配置 sniff: # TLS 默认如果不配置 ports 默认嗅探 443 TLS: ports: [443, 8443,47000-48000] HTTP: # 需要嗅探的端口, 默认嗅探 80 ports: [80, 8080-8880] override-destination: true # 可覆盖 sniffer.override-destination rules: - DOMAIN,relay.firefox.com,PROXY - GEOSITE,category-ads-all,REJECT - PROCESS-NAME,thunder,DIRECT - PROCESS-NAME,gopeed,DIRECT # - PROCESS-NAME,ndm,DIRECT - GEOSITE,youtube,PROXY - GEOSITE,google,PROXY - GEOSITE,twitter,PROXY - GEOSITE,mozilla,DIRECT - GEOSITE,apple,DIRECT - GEOSITE,bing,PROXY - GEOSITE,icloud,DIRECT - GEOSITE,microsoft@cn,DIRECT - GEOSITE,geolocation-!cn,PROXY - GEOSITE,CN,DIRECT - GEOIP,CN,DIRECT,no-resolve - GEOIP,telegram,PROXY,no-resolve - GEOSITE,private,DIRECT - MATCH,PROXY
summary:
Introduction This is bold text, and this is emphasized text.
#Generated by Clash Verge mode: rule profile: store-selected: true # 储存 API 对策略组的选择,以供下次启动时使用 store-fake-ip: true # 储存fakeip映射表,域名再次发生连接时，使用原有映射地址 mixed-port: 7890 allow-lan: false global-client-fingerprint: chrome find-process-mode: strict log-level: info geodata-mode: true unified-delay: true tcp-concurrent: true secret: '' external-controller: 127.0.0.1:9090 dns: enable: true prefer-h3: true listen: 0.0.0.0:1053 ipv6: true default-nameserver: - tls://223.5.5.5 - tls://1.1.1.1 enhanced-mode: fake-ip fake-ip-range: 198.18.0.1/16 fake-ip-filter: - '*.lan' - localhost.ptlogin2.qq.com nameserver: - https://223.
title: My First Post
